14031.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>! We've been waiting for you!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14031.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>！　待っていたぞ！！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14032.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I will stop the Epidemex from moving! You will
choke the life out of him!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14032.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「私は　けがれの渦の　動きを封じる！
　お前は　ヤツの息の根を　止めるのだ！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14032.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 난 부정한 소용돌이의 움직임을 막으마!
　넌 놈의 숨통을 끊어라!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14032.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我来封住污浊漩涡的动作！
你去了结它的性命！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14032.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我來封住汙穢漩渦的動作！
你去了結它的性命！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14033.en: <start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>I am death... the death of all living things.<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14033.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>「我は死……。
　生きとし生けるもの　すべての死。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14033.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>: 나는 죽음…….
　살아 있는 모든 생명의 죽음이다.<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14033.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>我是死亡……是一切生物的死亡。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14033.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>我是死亡……是一切生物的死亡。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14034.en:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>I will use your bodies to carry my burden to
the world... and now you may die...<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14034.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>「お前たちの身体を使って
　我は　世に　まいもどるとしよう……。
　さあ　死ぬがよい……。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14034.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>: 나는 너희의 몸을 이용해
　다시 세상으로 돌아갈 것이다…….
　자, 이만 죽어라…….<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14034.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>我要利用你们的身体
重返世间……
去死吧……<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14034.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>我要利用你們的身體
重返世間……
去死吧……<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14035.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>! Thanks for coming!!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14035.ja: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>！　よく来てくれた！！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14035.ko: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>! 잘 왔다!!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14036.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I will stop the Epidemex from moving! This
time, you will choke him to death!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14036.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「私は　けがれの渦の　動きを封じる！
　お前は　今度こそ
　ヤツの息の根を　止めるのだ！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14036.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 난 부정한 소용돌이의 움직임을 막으마!
　넌 이번에야말로 놈의 숨통을 끊어라!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14036.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我来封住污浊漩涡的动作！
你这回一定要了结它的性命！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14036.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我來封住汙穢漩渦的動作！
你這次一定要了結它的性命！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14037.en:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>It would be foolish to return again after
having so luckily escaped from my hands.<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14037.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>「運よく　我が手を逃れながら 
　ふたたび　戻るとは　愚かなり。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14037.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>: 운 좋게 내 손아귀에서 벗어났음에도
　다시 돌아오다니 어리석도다.<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14037.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>能从我手中逃走，算你走运。
居然还敢回来，真是愚蠢啊。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14037.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>能從我手中逃走，算你走運。
居然還敢回來，真是愚蠢啊。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14038.en:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>I will use your bodies to carry my burden to
the world... and now you may die...<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14038.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>「お前たちの身体を使って
　我は　世に　まいもどるとしよう……。
　さあ　死ぬがよい……。<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14038.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>: 나는 너희의 몸을 이용해
　다시 세상으로 돌아갈 것이다…….
　자, 이만 죽어라…….<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14038.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>我要利用你们的身体
重返世间……
去死吧……<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14038.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>我要利用你們的身體
重返世間……
去死吧……<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14039.ja: <start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>「オオォォオオォオォオオオオオオオ！！<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14039.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦哦！！<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14039.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m50033 _normal m00001>喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔！！<stop_lip_animation m50033 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14040.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Now... you have destroyed the breath of the
Reaper. You have done well...<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14040.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「これで……　死神の息吹を　滅ぼせたのだな。
　よく　やってくれた……。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14040.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 이걸로…… 사신의 숨결은 사라졌군.
　정말 잘했다…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14040.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>这样……死神气息就灭亡了。
你做得很好……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14040.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>這下子……死神吐息就滅亡了。
你做得很好……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14041.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I knew from the moment I met you. I knew from
the moment I met you that you were different
from others, that you had a special power...<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14041.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「出会った時から　わかっていた。
　お前は　人とはちがう
　特別なチカラを持つ者なのだと……。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14041.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 처음 만난 순간부터 알고 있었다.
　넌 다른 사람과는 다른
　특별한 힘을 지닌 존재라는 걸…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14041.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>从遇见你的时候我就知道了。
你与常人不同，
拥有特别的力量……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14041.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>從遇見你的時候我就知道了。
你與常人不同，
擁有特別的力量……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14042.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>...<cs_pchero>. Why did High Priest Kirika
make the Idol of Eldona out of a sparkling
tree?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14042.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「……<cs_pchero>。
　なぜ　大僧侶キリカは　閃香樹で
　エルドナ神像を　作ったのだろう？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14042.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: ……<cs_pchero>.
　대승려 키리카는 왜 섬향수로
　엘드나 신상을 만들었을까?<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14042.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>，为什么大僧侣雾迦
要用闪香树制作埃尔多纳神像呢？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14042.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>，
為什麼大僧侶霧迦要用閃香樹
製作艾爾多娜神像呢？<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14043.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I think that the High Priestess Kirika
entrusted her future to that statue, believing
that someone like you would emerge.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14043.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「私は　思うのだ……。大僧侶キリカは 
　お前のような者が　現れると信じ
　未来を　あの像に　託したのではないかと。 <stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14043.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 난…… 대승려 키리카가 너와 같은 자가
　나타나리라 믿고 그 신상에 미래의 희망을
　남긴 게 아닐까 하는 생각이 든다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14043.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我是这么认为的……大僧侣雾迦
相信会有你这样的人出现，
所以将未来托付在了那尊神像上吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14043.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我是這麼認為的……大僧侶霧迦
相信會有你這樣的人出現，
所以將未來託付在了那尊神像上吧。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14044.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Maybe that's how he wanted to teach them. The
true heart of God. What a priest should be...<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14044.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「そうして　教えたかったのかもしれない。
　本当の神の心を。僧侶のあるべき姿を……。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14044.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 그리고 우리에게 가르쳐 주려 한 걸지도 몰라.
　진정한 신의 마음을, 승려의 참된 모습을…….<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14044.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>同时，他也许想教导大家真正的神之心，
教导大家僧侣真正的样子……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14044.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>同時，他也許想教導大家，
何謂真正的神之心，身為一個僧侶該有的模樣……<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14045.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Let's go home. The Kirika order is waiting for
us.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14045.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「さあ……　帰ろう。
　キリカ修道会の皆が　待っている。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14045.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 자…… 돌아가자.
　키리카 수도회 사람들이 기다리고 있으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14045.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>好了……回去吧。
雾迦修道会的诸位还等着我们呢。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14045.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>好了……回去吧。
霧迦修道會的諸位在等著我們呢。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14047.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>Oh...thank you for your safe return. Now the
breath of the Reaper will never again appear
in this world.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14047.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「おお……よく　無事に帰ってくれました。 
　これで　二度と　死神の息吹が
　この世に現れることは　ないでしょう。 <stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14047.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 오오…… 무사히 돌아와서 다행입니다.
　이제 사신의 숨결은 두 번 다시
　이 세상에 나타나지 않겠군요.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14047.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>哦哦……欢迎你平安归来。
这下子，死神气息就
再也不会出现在世间了。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14047.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>喔喔……歡迎你平安歸來。
這下子，死神吐息就再也不會
出現在世間了。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14048.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>... No. It's the High Priest
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14048.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「<pc>……　いいえ。
　大僧侶　<pc>よ。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14048.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: <pc>…… 아니지.
　대승려 {pc}|hpp(이여,여).<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14048.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>……不。
大僧侣<pc>啊。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14048.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001><pc>……不。
是大僧侶<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14049.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>This is the Proof of PRI left by the High
Priest Kirika. You deserve to have it. Please
accept it.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14049.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「これは　大僧侶キリカが残した　僧侶の証です。
　あなたが持つに　ふさわしいものでしょう。
　お受け取りください。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14049.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 이건 대승려 키리카가 남긴 승려의 증표입니다.
　당신은 이걸 가질 자격이 있습니다.
　받으십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14049.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>这是大僧侣雾迦留下来的僧侣之证。
你最适合拥有它，
请收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14049.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>這是大僧侶霧迦留下來的僧侶之證。
你最適合擁有它，
請收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

14050.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>It was left to me by the great priest Kirika.
You deserve to have it. Please accept it.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14050.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「これは　大僧侶キリカが残した品です。
　あなたが持つに　ふさわしいものでしょう。
　お受け取りください。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14051.en:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>You have taught me the way of a true priest.
Let us perpetuate this teaching.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14051.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>「あなたは　本当の僧侶の道を教えてくれました。
　私たちは　この教えを
　永久に　語りついでいきましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14051.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>: 당신은 진정한 승려의 길이 무엇인지
　가르쳐 주었습니다. 우리는 이 가르침을
　영원히 후세에 전할 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14051.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>你教会了我们
真正的僧侣之道。
我们会永远传诵你的教诲。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14051.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00285 _normal m00001>你教會了我們
真正的僧侶之道。
我們會永遠傳誦你的教誨。<stop_lip_animation n00285 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14053.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>You are no longer my disciple. I am no match
for you in power or mind.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14053.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「お前は　もう私の弟子ではない。
　そのチカラも　心も……
　私は　お前に　とうてい　かなわんからな。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14053.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 넌 더 이상 내 제자가 아니다.
　그 힘도, 마음도……
　나와는 차원이 다르니까.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14053.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>你已经不再是我的弟子了。
你的力量、内心……都已经远远超越我了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14053.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>你已經不再是我的弟子了。
你的力量、內心……
都已經遠遠超越我了。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14054.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>From now on, leave the monastery and aim high
with your own strength. You will become an
even better priest.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14054.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「これからは　修道会を出て
　自分のチカラで　高みを目指せ。
　お前は　さらに　よい僧侶になれるはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14054.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 앞으로는 수도회를 떠나
　네 힘으로 스스로를 갈고닦아라.
　넌 더 좋은 승려가 될 수 있을 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14054.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>今后就离开修道会，
靠自己的力量去追寻更高的目标吧。
你肯定能成为更加出色的僧侣的。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14054.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>今後就離開修道會，
靠自己的力量去追尋更高的目標吧。
你肯定能成為更加出色的僧侶。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14055.en: <start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>I intend to be around Arnoud more from now on.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14055.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「私は　これからは　もっと
　アルノーのそばに　いてやるつもりだ。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14055.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 난 앞으로는 아르노와
　더 많은 시간을 보낼 생각이다.<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14055.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我决定以后
多陪陪步野宇。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14055.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>我決定以後
多陪陪阿爾諾。<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

14056.en:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>Thank you <pc>. I will never forget
you. See you again someday!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14056.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　<pc>。
　お前のことは　決して　忘れない。
　いつか　また会おう！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14056.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>: 고맙다, <pc>.
　절대 널 잊지 않으마.
　언젠가 또 보자!<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14056.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<pc>。
我绝不会忘记你的。
有缘再见吧！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>
14056.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00786 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<pc>。
我絕不會忘記你的。
有緣再見吧！<stop_lip_animation n00786 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32319.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>My mom and I went to visit my father's grave
for the first time in a while. We walked a
long way and I'm exhausted.<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32319.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「ボクね　お母さんと　ひさしぶりに
　お父さんの　お墓参りに行ったの。
　うんと遠くまで歩いたから　クタクタだよ。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32319.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 엄마랑 오랜만에
　아빠 무덤에 다녀왔어요.
　멀리까지 걸어갔다 왔더니 힘드네요.<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32319.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>我跟妈妈去扫爸爸的墓，
我已经好久没有去了。
走了好远的路，累死我了。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32319.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>我跟媽媽去掃爸爸的墓，
我已經好久沒有去了。
走了好遠的路，累死我了。<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000715.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>From now on, I'm going to travel
around the world with my mom. <pc>I'm
going to travel around like you!<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000715.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「これからは　お母さんと
　世界中の　いろんな所をまわるんだ。
　<pc>ねえちゃんみたいに　旅するの！<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000715.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 이제부터는 엄마랑
　세계 곳곳을 다니기로 했어요.
　<pc> 누나처럼 여행할 거예요!<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000715.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>从今往后我要和妈妈一起，
环游世界中的各种地方。
像<pc>姐姐一样旅行！<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000715.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>今後我要和媽媽一起
環遊全世界的各個地方。
像<pc>姊姊一樣旅行！<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000716.en:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>From now on, I'm going to travel
around the world with my mom. <pc>I'm
going to travel around like you!<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000716.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>「これからは　お母さんと
　世界中の　いろんな所をまわるんだ。
　<pc>にいちゃんみたいに　旅するの！<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000716.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>: 이제부터는 엄마랑
　세계 곳곳을 다니기로 했어요.
　<pc> 형처럼 여행할 거예요!<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000716.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>从今往后我要和妈妈一起，
环游世界中的各种地方。
像<pc>哥哥一样旅行！<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000716.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00787 _normal m00001>今後我要和媽媽一起
環遊全世界的各個地方。
像<pc>哥哥一樣旅行！<stop_lip_animation n00787 CLOSE_MOUTH>
